alert.note: Alert for Brown; Nicollet; Sibley (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 24 at 1:32PM CDT until October 24 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Sibley County in central Minnesota... East central Brown County in south central Minnesota... Nicollet County in south central Minnesota... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 132 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Ulm, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... New Ulm, St. Peter, Courtland, Lafayette, New Sweden, Klossner, Essig, Rush River, New Ulm Airport, New Rome, Norseland, and Flandrau State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
